trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fall River
There were no other sightings in Fall River on or around March 14th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailswas outside of my house smoking a cigaret, happened to look up in a westerly direction, saw a perfect cube shaped object pulsating a red color. it was about the size of my thumb held at arms length.I think it was very high up because below it a passenger jet was leaving a contrail.watched it hover, it was spinning, at about two minutes it started to eject what looked like molten red metal i could not beleive what i was seeing do not really beleive in ufos because of the distances involved from one star to another. all of a sudden the cube changed shape to a triangle and shot off at an incredible speed to the west. what freeked me out it that it didnt leave any contrail.within one second it was out of sight. unless the government has technology 500 years ahead of what they tell us i truly beleive i witnessed a ufo.
Summary: pulsating red cube shaped object that spitted out molten metal,changed shape, and flew off at incredible speed
